original_text: The priests that are carrying the Covenant Box must go to the shore of the Jordan River. Tell them to go into the water and to stand there.’
korean_text: 너는 언약궤를 멘 제사장들에게 명령하여 이르기를 너희가 요단 물 가에 이르거든 요단에 들어서라 하라

sentences.original_text: The priests that are carrying the Covenant Box
must go to the shore of the Jordan River.
Tell them to go into the water
